sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Brianna from "../assets/BriannaKnox.jpeg"; import Amanda from "../assets/AmandaHuber.jpeg"; import Diana from "../assets/DianaLLeras.webp"; import Roberto from "../assets/RobertoMartinez.jpeg"; import Nichole from "../assets/NicholeWalton.jpeg"; import Jonathan from "../assets/JonathanMeza.jpeg"; import Brandon from "../assets/BrandonShindo.jpeg"; import Josephine from "../assets/JosephineAlmanzar.webp"; import Translation from "./TranslationEngToSpan/Mental.json"; export const Team = (props) => { const { language } = props; // const [language,setLanguage]=useState("spanish") const [content, setContent] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { if (language === "english") { setContent(Translation.english); } else if (language === "spanish") { setContent(Translation.spanish); } }, [language]); return (

{content.translate66} {/* Mentally Team */}

{content.translate665} {/* Welcome */} {" "} {content.translate67} {/* our talented team of professionals */}

{content.translate68} {/* Below you will find some of our talented group of therapists. */}

Brianna Knox

{content.translate69} {/* Licensed Clinical Social Worker */}

{content.translate70} {/* As a Black, Queer, Millennial therapist, I am passionate about providing relatable therapy to BIPOC and LGBTQ+ Millennials. */}

Amanda Huber Lopera

{content.translate71} {/* Licensed Clinical Social Worker, MSW */}

{content.translate72} {/* Dedicated to supporting the black and brown communities and all other vulnerable people. Hablo Espa単ol! */}

Diana Lleras

{content.translate73} {/* Licensed Professional Counselor, MS, NCC */}

{content.translate74} {/* My areas of specialty include Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, Dialectical Behavioral Therapy, Cognitive Processing Therapy, and Trauma-focused CBT. Hablo Espa単ol! */}

Roberto Carlos Martinez

{content.translate75} {/* Licensed Professional Counselor, LCPC, NCC, CCTP */}

{content.translate76} {/* I specialize in providing counseling for grief, loss, anxiety, trauma, and relationship issues. Hablo Espa単ol! */}

Nichole Walton

{content.translate77} {/* Licensed Clinical Social Worker, MCAP, SAP, QS */}

{content.translate78} {/* I am a Licensed Clinical Social Worker who has focused training with treating issues of trauma and addiction. */}

Jonathan Meza

{content.translate79} {/* Licensed Professional Clinical Counselor */}

{content.translate80} {/* My areas of experience and specialty include working with children, adolescents and adults facing depression, anxiety, anger,grief counseling. Hablo Espa単ol! */}

Brandon Shindo

{content.translate81} {/* Licensed Clinical Social Worker, MSW */}

{content.translate82} {/* Specialization: Asian American Pacific Islander, Young Professionals, and College Students' Mental Health. */}

Dr. Josephine Almanzar

{content.translate83} {/* Licensed Psychologist */}

{content.translate84} {/* I view my clients holistically by celebrating cultural differences and recognizing social justice as an integral part of healing. */}

); };
